Package services

Class BankAccountService

java.lang.Object
services.BankAccountService
All Implemented Interfaces:
BankAccountServiceI
public class BankAccountService extends Object implements BankAccountServiceI
A service class for managing bank accounts and related financial transactions. This service class provides methods for creating, retrieving, and managing bank accounts, as well as performing financial transactions such as withdrawals and deposits.
Author:
Gleb Nickolaenko

    • withdrawMoney

      public boolean withdrawMoney(String bankAccountId, BigDecimal amount, String transactionId) throws BaseException
      Performs a withdrawal operation from a bank account.
      Specified by:
      withdrawMoney in interface BankAccountServiceI
      Parameters:
      bankAccountId - The ID of the bank account from which to withdraw.
      amount - The amount to withdraw.
      transactionId - The ID of the transaction (optional).
      Returns:
      true if the withdrawal is successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      BaseException - if the operation encounters an error, such as a non-existing account or insufficient funds.
